application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Back Garden (Right Boundary) T1: Bay tree x2 - Reduce height by 1.5 metres, trim to shape  Height 6m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 4.5m & spread to 2.5mT2: Ellwoodii tree - Fell to ground level (stump to remain) Height 3m & spread 1m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0mT3: Cherry tree - Fell to ground level, grind out stump Height 6m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0mT4: Silver birch tree - Prune overhang back by 3 metres Height 6m & spread 6m. Reduce height to 6m & spread to 3mT5: Eucalyptus tree - Fell to ground level, grind out stump Height 6m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0mT6: Mimosa tree - Remove major deadwood overhanging from neighbour's side only Height 6m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 6m & spread to 3mT7: Acer tree - Fell to ground level, grind out stump Height 4m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0mReason for work: More light, maintaining this tree in its current setting, reduce overhang onto neighbours garden
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T1
